column4: hm..if i install winxp and leave 1 partition unused (no partition type) .. how can i install ubuntu on it...? What i must select in install progres? Do i must leave 2 partitons (1 for swap) ?
leave one section "unallocated" and the installer can use/partion that unallocated space
hm..and i must to give install proces, manual partitioning ?
i just rember checking "use esisting unallocated space" or similer.

you always can install win on second partition :)
